paragraph.paragraph:
All Vision2 items inherit EV_ITEM. To view the classes contained in the items cluster, click
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/items/index.xml here .
paragraph.heading: 2What is an item?
paragraph.paragraph: A Vision2 item is an object that is used to display information within certain primitives. For example, EV_LIST may hold items of type EV_LIST_ITEM. All Vision2 items are descendants of EV_PIXMAPABLE meaning they can display an EV_PIXMAP.
